info.name: Bhagwat Gita API
info.description: Complete API collection for the Bhagwat Gita verses management system

request.description: Check if the server is running and healthy

query.description: Search in sanskrit, transliteration, translation, or meaning

request.description: Get all verses with optional pagination, filtering, and search
Get a specific verse by its MongoDB ObjectId
Get all verses from a specific chapter (1-18)

item.name: Get Verse by Chapter and Verse Number

request.description: Get a specific verse by chapter and verse number (simplified format)
Get a specific verse with all commentary data (full format)

body.raw:
{
  "chapter": 1,
  "verse": 1,
  "sanskrit": "धृतराष्ट्र उवाच | धर्मक्षेत्रे कुरुक्षेत्रे समवेता युयुत्सवः | मामकाः पाण्डवाश्चैव किमकुर्वत सञ्जय ||",
  "transliteration": "dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca dharma-kṣetre kuru-kṣetre samavetā yuyutsavaḥ māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva kim akurvata sañjaya",
  "translation": "Dhritarashtra said: O Sanjaya, what did my sons and the sons of Pandu do when they had assembled together, eager for battle, on the holy plain of Kurukshetra?",
  "meaning": "Dhritarashtra asks Sanjaya about the events that took place on the battlefield of Kurukshetra when both armies were assembled and ready for war.",
  "commentary": "This verse sets the stage for the entire Bhagavad Gita, as Dhritarashtra inquires about the events that led to the great discourse between Krishna and Arjuna.",
  "tags": ["opening", "battlefield", "inquiry"]
}
